mapper.insert: INSERT INTO highlight (highlight_content, highlight_page, highlight_cover, book_isbn, user_id, is_public) VALUES (#{highlightContent}, #{highlightPage}, #{highlightCover}, #{bookIsbn}, #{userId}, #{isPublic})
mapper.select: SELECT highlight_id highlightId, highlight_content highlightContent, highlight_page highlightPage, highlight_cover highlightCover, h.book_isbn bookIsbn, b.book_title bookTitle, user_id userId, created_date createdDate, updated_date updatedDate, is_public isPublic FROM highlight h JOIN book b ON h.book_isbn = b.book_isbn WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_date DESC

SELECT highlight_id highlightId, highlight_content highlightContent, highlight_page highlightPage, highlight_cover highlightCover, h.book_isbn bookIsbn, b.book_title bookTitle, user_id userId, created_date createdDate, updated_date updatedDate, is_public isPublic FROM highlight h JOIN book b ON h.book_isbn = b.book_isbn WHERE highlight_id IN (select highlight_id from good where user_id=#{userId}) ORDER BY created_date DESC

SELECT highlight_id highlightId, highlight_content highlightContent, highlight_page highlightPage, highlight_cover highlightCover, h.book_isbn bookIsbn, b.book_title bookTitle, user_id userId, created_date createdDate, updated_date updatedDate, is_public isPublic FROM highlight h JOIN book b ON h.book_isbn = b.book_isbn WHERE h.user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY h.updated_date DESC LIMIT 1;

select h.highlight_id, h.highlight_content, h.highlight_page, h.highlight_cover, h.book_isbn, b.book_title, h.created_date, h.updated_date, h.is_public, u.user_id, u.user_email, u.user_nickname, u.user_job, u.user_profile_img, u.user_birth from highlight h join user u on u.user_id = h.user_id join book b on h.book_isbn = b.book_isbn where highlight_id = #{highlightId}

select highlight_id highlightId, highlight_content highlightContent, highlight_page highlightPage, highlight_cover highlightCover, book_isbn bookIsbn, user_id userId, created_date createdDate, updated_date updatedDate, is_public isPublic from highlight where highlight_id = #{highlightId}

select highlight_id highlightId, highlight_content highlightContent, highlight_page highlightPage, highlight_cover highlightCover, h.book_isbn bookIsbn, b.book_title bookTitle, h.user_id userId, u.user_nickname userNickname, u.user_profile_img userProfileImg, created_date createdDate, updated_date updatedDate, is_public isPublic from highlight h join book b on b.book_isbn = h.book_isbn join user u on h.user_id = u.user_id where is_public = 1 ORDER BY updated_date DESC
select count(*) from good where highlight_id = #{highlightId}
select count(*) from good where user_id = #{userId} and highlight_id = #{highlightId}
mapper.update: update highlight h set h.highlight_content = #{highlightContent}, h.highlight_page = #{highlightPage}, h.is_public = #{isPublic}, h.highlight_cover = #{highlightCover}, h.updated_date = now() where highlight_id = #{highlightId}
mapper.delete: delete from good where highlight_id = #{highlightId} and user_id = #{userId}
